html:
3.26.23  4:14 am   how do you get over comparing yourself to others and just start making the best shit you can?

      one trick i learned was to start writing the song before i even hit the recording studio. seems like most people actually don't do that, but i found out it's better for me

3.26.23  3:17 am   I just met up with a girl I knew in High School. She is literally a dream girl but is already with someone. Please help me get over her because I really think I am in love with this lady.

      someone you'll like even more just became available, and so did you

3.26.23  2:13 am   would you rather play with a deck of cards or go to sleep?

      all in due time

3.26.23  12:59 am   hey bill, do you or do you not?

      might

3.25.23  11:06 pm   What does an average day in the life of Bill Wurtz consist of?

      trying to figure things out

3.25.23  10:44 pm   So I've learned that in order to figure out the next part of a song, I should listen to it and imagine what comes next, but what if I have a part of a song and I want to figure out what comes before it, like to make an intro

      i really have no idea how to do that, but it still has to be done sometimes. here are some tricks you might want to try. try continuing forward without the intro for now. then, keep writing until it winds back around to the part you have (most songs tend to do that, unless it's one of those 1-way songs, which is possible). When it comes back around, check out what happens just before it comes back around. the solution can sometimes be found there. another trick is to try doing almost nothing

3.25.23  7:11 pm   What do you think the purpose of a sus2sus4 chord is supposed to be

      that's completely up to you. but i'm pretty sure you'll find that it works good, for example, if you want C in the bass and either D or F in the melody

3.25.23  6:49 pm   how the fuck are you supposed to pass a job interview without any experience

      there are 3 ways:
     get a job that requires no experience
     get a job from a friend
     make friends with the person interviewing you immediately, and then get a job from that friend

3.25.23  6:28 pm   i demand answers

      me too

3.25.23  3:40 pm   Favorite color?

      off-grey

3.25.23  2:04 pm   i have a few questions thanks a ton if you answer

how much time do you spend searching for new sounds?

     about 2 weeks every 5 years

     how much time do you spend editing sounds you have?

     about 2 weeks every 2 years

3.25.23  1:44 pm   what are your favorite musical artists

      could be you

3.25.23  12:51 pm   isn't 7/8 timing just 4/4 + 3/4 or is it 3/4 + 4/4.

     no.
     7/8 could be like 2/4 + 3/8, or, 3/8 + 2/4
     7/4 could be 4/4 + 3/4, or, 3/4 + 4/4

3.25.23  12:41 pm   Does being good all the time get tiring?

     it might

      If so, how do you cope with that?

     get bad some of the time

3.25.23  11:54 am   about the next video, are you having trouble with one aspect or part of it, or all of it has some difficulty?

      i have not had any trouble with the video. i'm doing some work on refining and improving the overall music-video process, which, as always, is gargantuan and always needs improvements

3.25.23  10:32 am   do you have any cool hobbies other than making music?

     making videos to go with the music, or making videos for music to go with

     if so which is your favorite 

      still looking for that sweet spot, right in the middle

3.25.23  9:57 am   I am so dissatisfied and I feel lied to. You made me believe that you were a princess for 3 minutes and 20 seconds only to tell me that you read that wrong can you try to prevent this mistake from happening next time?

      generally, i'd say try to avoid 'fiction', and also try to avoid music with lyrics, because it often contains fiction

3.25.23  7:55 am   do you ever look in a mirror too long and become extremely aware of life

      for me it happens after only 2 moments, which, bizarrely, seem to be superimposed into the same moment. that's when i realize the nature of decision-making

3.25.23  7:54 am   Opinion on tiny cars

      too big

3.25.23  6:20 am   is a 4096th note practical?

      sure, at .5 bpm

3.25.23  5:03 am   is it difficult to find what you're passionate for in life.

     maybe. sometimes there might be so much, it could be hard to parse or define it

      it seems like you've known since young you wanted to create music

3.25.23  1:30 am   i think you and i and lots of other people might have something in common because sometimes other people think i am weird when i think i am normal. i find being labelled weird to be a bit reductive for some reason. i think this is probably a common experience which makes me feel better. but what does it mean?

      weirdness is very common

3.25.23  12:40 am   i have a conundrum bill. there is this song (actually there are a few others, now that i think about it) that is so well written that i love it so much and want to listen to it forever. the problem is it's way too sad. both the song itself and the circumstances surrounding it in my memories. i can't even listen to it without getting so sad and immersed in the past. but i want to listen to it, because it's good. what should i do 

      draw some pictures that remind you of the song. this might make you sad also, temporarily, but i think it's a good opportunity because it will probably be pretty deeply inspired

3.25.23  12:39 am   Do you or do you not feel Bonita

      not at this time

3.24.23  11:44 pm   Can you give me a physics lesson

      sure, if you can tell me which way is up

3.24.23  9:59 pm   opinion on the Cdim chord?

      if there's Cdim, it's most likely the song is in the key of E, F#, or B

3.24.23  9:58 pm   what is your favorite note

      changing notes. that's the only thing that does it for me anymore

3.24.23  9:18 pm   why don't you do albums?

      i've never liked any album. so me making an album would be like me trying to paint with a color i can't perceive

3.24.23  9:05 pm   How does one get ahead of themselves.

      just put 1 foot in front of the other

3.24.23  8:13 pm   Was "romp time" in got some money inspired by geometry dash,

     no

      and is "romp" a real word? It sounds cool and the right word to use in that scenario, but I'm not sure if you just made it up or not.

      romp is a word. it's used in movie reviews

3.24.23  7:51 pm   is the demisemihemidemisemiquaver a useful thing to know?

      never heard of it

3.24.23  7:49 pm   what to do when people look at me weird because i am different than them

      can you explain what happened in a little more detail

3.24.23  5:50 pm   Are you still groovy like a pelican?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

3.24.23  2:43 pm   what is something you dont find online

      the log off button

3.24.23  2:33 pm   How are you so prolific

      i'm not sure

3.24.23  1:21 pm   I funniness a philosophy?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

3.24.23  12:51 pm   How do I pass chemistry? 

      i have no idea

3.24.23  9:38 am   Do you listen to music from Canadian artists?

      i assume so. i don't always keep track of the canadianness of artists. to add to the ambiguity, canadians have become very good at blending in with non-canadians

3.24.23  7:19 am   do you believe in god or are you an atheist

      there's got to be some other options

3.24.23  6:16 am   do you think life is a little game for fun or a serious event for business? 

      there's got to be some other options

3.24.23  6:03 am   What is the reciepe to KFC's chicken 

      i only know the recipe of the bucket

3.24.23  1:59 am   your opinion on canned pineapple

      i'll believe it when i see it

3.24.23  1:37 am   do you ever remember your own work or somebody mentions it and you remember you made it and you recall a lot of feelings from that time,

     yes

      or do you tend to forget about it?

     certainly when someone mentions it, that would not be the time i would forget. that would be the time i'd remember. the moment just before, however, that would be the moment when i would have at least temporarily forgotten it

     because for me if it wasn't a study and was something i created from stratch i never forget about it.

3.23.23  11:54 pm   What was the last musical instrument you purchased

     a keyboard

     and why?

     the previous one was getting worn out

3.23.23  11:51 pm   ARE YOU READY TO ROCK?

      yes i am

3.23.23  10:07 pm   opinions on tea

      not my cup of tea

3.23.23  9:43 pm   Thoughts on bread?

      the flavor overwhelms me

3.23.23  9:36 pm   why are daws so goddamn confusing

      because they have 30 times more features than you need right now

3.23.23  8:11 pm   What categories are you attached to?

      misc

3.23.23  7:58 pm   do you ever just scream while your home alone for no reason

      no
